name: Room Club
slogan: Easy and flexible solutions for everyone in the private rental sector

team.name: Samuele Scodeggio
team.bioHtml: founder of Room Club, an innovative web platform that allows PBSA to achieve high occupancy and efficiency.

team.title: CEO & Founder
team.name: Samuele Scodeggio
team.bioHtml: founder of Room Club, an innovative web platform that allows PBSA to achieve high occupancy and efficiency.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Working mainly on https://roomclub.com to improve both front end and back end of the website.

The full stack developer will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the system. 

The role comes with flexible working hours and a relaxed working environment in the beautiful city of London. We offer 28 days paid holiday, paid lunch breaks and have sponsored previous employees to study professional qualifications and to attend conferences and training relevant to their work.

The ideal candidate should have:
Structured approach to troubleshooting
Confidence with PHP, MySQL, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, etc
Front end javascript development
Experience with interfacing with search engines and web based data visualization libraries
Full life cycle development, including design, implementation, and testing.
